text:
Hi
When I write some lines into the log file using the log4j api,
sometimes it's skipping the name and line number of the calling 
class. Here I am adding few lines from my log file
*******************************************
2001-03-14 12:50:52,531 DEBUG (?:?) - Found ......
2001-03-14 12:50:52,609 DEBUG (?:?) - Found .....
2001-03-14 12:50:52,609 DEBUG (?:?) - Was there any match -->true
2001-03-14 12:50:52,843 DEBUG (DoTransform1.java:190) - EXCEPTION: 
javax.xml.transform.TransformerException: java.io.FileNotFoundException: 
C:\home\xml\input.mo\xml\french\transformation\accessories.xsl (The system 
cannot find the path specified)
***********************************************
as you could see, it could'nt get the calling class name.
Can you please let me know, how to fix it?
Thanks
Sri
